code: import React from'react';import'../App.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteUser from'./DeleteUser';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var UserList=function UserList(props){var userList=props.userList,setUserList=props.setUserList;console.log('User List',userList);var removeFromDom=function removeFromDom(userId){setUserList(userList.filter(function(user){return user._id!==userId;}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:"All Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Delete"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:userList.map(function(user,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/".concat(user._id),children:[' ',user.firstName,' ',user.lastName]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/edit/'+user._id,children:"Edit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteUser,{userId:user._id,successCallback:function successCallback(){return removeFromDom(user._id);}})})]},index);})})]})]});};export default UserList;
